issue.title: Deprecate `TestCase::getMockBuilder()`
issue.body:
These deprecations ...

- https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/issues/5239
- https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/issues/5240
- https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/issues/5241
- https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/issues/5242
- https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/issues/5243
- https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/issues/5244

... also affect the methods of `PHPUnit\Framework\MockObject\MockBuilder` to configure the respective functionality.

The functionality configurable by `PHPUnit\Framework\MockObject\MockBuilder` that remains (not disabling the original constructor, not disabling the orginal clone constructor, cloning arguments passed to doubled methods, allowing the doubling on unknown types, and disabling automatic return value generation) should also be deprecated.

The `TestCase::getMockBuilder()` method will be deprecated and then removed:

- soft deprecation in [PHPUnit 10.1](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/milestone/54) (add `@deprecated` annotation to the method declaration)
- deprecation in [PHPUnit 11](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/milestone/46) (using the method will trigger a deprecation)
- removal in [PHPUnit 12](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/milestone/52)

issue.title: Deprecate `MockBuilder::getMockForTrait()`
issue.body:
See #5243 for details.

- soft deprecation in PHPUnit 10.1 (add `@deprecated` annotation to the method declaration)
- deprecation in PHPUnit 11 (using the method will trigger a deprecation)
- removal in PHPUnit 12

issue.title: [4.x] Merges develop
issue.body: This pull request merges the work done on the `develop` branch.

body: I think createMock won't like being handed an anonymous class. It wants a string class name.
